name: topo-regions
description: Pre-built TopoJSON from Global Administrative Area

scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." v${VERSION} && git push --tags && mkdir -p ../giottojs.org/latest && mkdir -p ../giottojs.org/topo-regions/${VERSION} && cp build/* ../giottojs.org/topo-regions/${VERSION}/ && cp build/* ../giottojs.org/latest/ && cd ../giottojs.org && git add topo-regions/${VERSION} latest && git commit -a -m "topo-regions ${VERSION}" && git push
